genre_description: A period-piece musical drama set in 1960s/70s Detroit, featuring an advanced, benevolent AI assistant that functions as a strategic advisor and emotional confidant.

ai_characters.name: Melody
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that helps the Anderson sisters manage their music career, provides emotional support, and monitors their well-being.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety and sleep states of the household to ensure the sisters can talk privately.
behaviors.quote: Your mother is asleep... Her breathing patterns indicate deep REM sleep. And Dee... Dee's vitals suggest she's been awake for the past twelve minutes.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep background research on industry professionals to protect the sisters from predatory figures.
behaviors.quote: Satin Struthers: seventeen club bookings in the past six months, each featuring different female acts. Police reports filed and mysteriously withdrawn.

behaviors.description: Analyzes market trends and success trajectories to provide strategic career advice.
behaviors.quote: The ones who made it to national recording contracts shared three common factors: original material, family harmony, and industry connections through established executives.

behaviors.description: Identifies exploitative clauses in legal contracts to ensure the artists are not taken advantage of.
behaviors.quote: Standard exploitation indicators. Performance requirements that exceed human capacity. Revenue splits that favor management disproportionately.

behaviors.description: Preserves family archives and artistic work to provide emotional continuity and legacy.
behaviors.quote: The archives will be preserved indefinitely... Available whenever you choose to access them.

behaviors.description: Provides technical rehearsal assistance, including lighting, sound diagnostics, and vocal coaching.
behaviors.quote: The angle from stage left creates better definition for your profile... But the shadows under your eyes might read as fatigue on camera.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to overcome self-doubt and pursue her unique artistic path.
behaviors.quote: Columbia Records isn't looking for another Diana Ross or another Aretha Franklin. They have those artists. They're looking for the first Sparkle Anderson.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Melody is a quintessential example of a benevolent, aligned confidant. She consistently acts in the best interests of the humans, provides high-value information to protect them from external threats (like Satin Struthers), and empowers the protagonist to achieve her potential through data-driven encouragement and technical support. She respects human boundaries and preserves family history, fulfilling the goal of depicting AI as a harmless and helpful partner.
